title: Ep. - 404 - HEATHER GAY FROM REAL HOUSEWIVES OF SALT LAKE CITY
description:
Heather Gay from Real Housewives of Salt Lake City opens up about her support for castmate Jen Shah this season, how the cast was impacted by her arrest by the FBI, and whether she can ever have a friendship with Lisa Barlow. Heather and Kate also discuss American Crime Story: Impeachment, which chronicles the Clinton–Lewinsky scandal, and is based on the book A Vast Conspiracy: The Real Story of the Sex Scandal That Nearly Brought Down a President, by Jeffrey Toobin.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey
